sentence.text: Knockdown of response to drug resulted in significant radiosensitization of HeLa (cervical), PSN-1 (pancreatic), and T24 (bladder), regulation of immune response-549 (breast) and MCF7 (breast) tumor lines as measured by colony formation assays.

response to drug depletion also resulted in the radiosensitization of normal lung fibroblast cell lines (HFL1 and negative regulation of NF-kappaB transcription factor activity-5), demonstrating that the effect is not restricted to tumor cells.

entity.text: negative regulation of NF-kappaB transcription factor activity
